Humans would have been limited to daytime activities, and would now have the ability to work and explore at night, potentially opening up new job opportunities and industries.
In the medical field, doctors and nurses would be able to perform surgeries and diagnose illnesses in the dark, which could lead to better outcomes for patients.
The field of photography would be revolutionized, as humans would be able to capture images in low light conditions without the need for artificial lighting.
Humans would be able be more in tune with nature, as they would be able to observe animals and plants in their natural habitat at night.
